name: HEARTS OF COLD - REDEMPTION
description:
STORY
The year is 2070. The Earth has become unstable and can no longer provide for all our needs. Twenty years ago the World Council ordered that another planet be found that could sustain our population. Father had been assigned as Commander of the survey mission which would take him away for a very long time. I was six years old. I remember waving goodbye the day he left. I never saw him again. So it was that Homo2 was discovered

Things have changed a lot since then and so have I. Homo2 has been made ready to receive our people and I was appointed Commander of a ship in the Orion Fleet which was to be the first making the journey. The Controllers have taken over on Homo2. They would have the planet for themselves and have ordered that further incoming traffic from Earth be intercepted and destroyed.

MISSION
Go immediately to the nearest military Battle Port and board the first available ship leaving for Homo2. Your mission is clear - you must take back Homo2 from the Controllers and allow the colonization to proceed. You will not be allowed to fail.

LEVELS
27 Game Levels

PLAYER
First and Third Person. Walk, Run, Crouch, Jump, Prone, Strafe, Peek, Swim, Climb Ladder. Drive Terrestrial Vehicles, Pilot Airborne Vehicles.

CHARACTERS
Large number of Characters
FRIENDS
Allies, Friendly Helpers, Passive Civilians
ENEMIES
Military, Civilian, Zombies, Vehicles, Animals

WEAPONS
Knife, Pistol, Shotgun, SMG, Auto Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Dual Pistols, Rocket Launcher, Rail Gun, Quasar, Sentry Gun, Grenade, Placeable Mine

COLLECTABLES
Weapons, Ammo, Health

VEHICLES
Truck, Car, Helicopter, Train, Boat, Spacecraft, Moon Buggy

OTHER
Explosive Objects
